metadata.title: CVE-2020-13340 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions prior to13.2.10, 13.3.7 and 13.4.2: Stored XSS in CI Job Log

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
